commandDescription: Generate a subset of the project base on a diff file generated by a git diff --raw command. You can ommit the diff file and provide the revisionFrom and optionally revisionTo insted.
outputFolderDescription: Name of the output folder that will contain the modified files
diffFileDescription: Name of the file which shows changes between commits
encodingDescription: Encoding of the file default to utf8
revisionFromDescription: Revision from wich the diff will be executed. Required if you ommit to provide the diff file parameter.
revisionToDescription: Revision to wich the diff will be executed. If you ommit this parameter, the head will be used
